Class UserInfoGetter

  • java.lang.Object
    • by.tc.auction.dao.user_operation.realization.util.UserInfoGetter

  • public class UserInfoGetter
extends java.lang.Object
    A class is used to create and execute a query to a database to get info about users in a database.

    semenovich

      • getUsers

        public java.util.ArrayList<User> getUsers(java.sql.Connection connection)
                                   throws java.sql.SQLException
        Creates and executes query to a database to get all users.
        Parameters:
        connection - - a connection to a database.
        Returns:
        A list of all users in a database. Empty list if users don't exist in a database.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - - if a database access error or other errors occurred.

      • getUsersBySearching

        public java.util.ArrayList<User> getUsersBySearching(java.sql.Connection connection,
                                                     java.lang.String searchLine)
                                              throws java.sql.SQLException
        Creates and executes query to a database to get users by matching a login of users
        Parameters:
        connection - - a connection to a database.
        searchLine - - a search line which will be matched with a user name.
        Returns:
        A list of such users in a database. Empty list if such users don't exist in a database.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - - if a database access error or other errors occurred.

      • getPersonalUserInfo

        public User getPersonalUserInfo(java.sql.Connection connection,
                                java.lang.String login)
                         throws java.sql.SQLException
        Creates and executes query to a database to get personal user info.
        Parameters:
        connection - - a connection to a database.
        login - - a user login.
        Returns:
        A user if a user exists in a database. null if a user doesn't exist in a database.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - - if a database access error or other errors occurred.

      • getUserLots

        public java.util.ArrayList<Lot> getUserLots(java.sql.Connection connection,
                                            java.lang.String login)
                                     throws java.sql.SQLException
        Creates and executes query to a database to get user lots.
        Parameters:
        connection - - a connection to a database.
        login - - a user login.
        Returns:
        A list of user lots in a database. Empty list if such lots don't exist in a database. null if a user doesn't exist in a database.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - - if a database access error or other errors occurred.
